interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DAN Technology Anti-Scald 200℉-500℉ Electric Press Hot Comb for Black Hair, Beard and Wigs, Ceramic Unisex Hair Beard Straightener and Curler, Dual Voltage for Travel, Home and Salon Use
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: DAN Technology
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAN Technology', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Item Weight': '0.6 Pounds', 'Package Dimensions': '12.9 x 4.8 x 2.4 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DAN Technology'}
Review Text: The anti scold comb protector is the best addition to this type of hair straightener. It keeps your head and ears from getting burned, while it lets your hair glide through the hot slits of the comb. The hot comb can be used for people with any colored hair. I know because I tried it on my slightly wavy thin light colored hair, and to my amazement, it worked! It has a digital display and a 360 degree cord (it can spin in circles without tangling). The temperature control knob is right where I place my hand, so I have to make sure that I don't hit it by accident. Other than that, it performs well, as advertised.
Review Title: The hot comb can be used for people with any color of hair, not just "Black Hair, Beard and Wigs"
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Emilia Hypoallergenic Baby Lotion - Quick-Absorbing, Non-Greasy, Alcohol-Free Baby Body Oatmeal Cream With Natural Colloidal Oatmeal for Dry Skin Eczema - Provides 24 Hour Moisturization - 8.8 fl.oz.
Emilia
{'Brand': 'Emilia', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 2.52 x 2.24 inches; 10.12 Ounces'}
Emilia Baby Body Lotion will really make your skin as soft as your babies! I just had to try it on myself because I have eczema and they said it is hypoallergenic. I can tell you that it doesn't irritate my skin ad the softness is really noticeable...and that you might not be able to notice on your baby because a babies skin is (usually) already soft. I am an adult that has allergies to a lot of things that show up in skin irritations, and I do not think that you can go wrong with buying this lotion. This is a great one for your newborn, baby, and the whole family. The only con would be if you don't like the smell of baby powder. It smells like a creamy baby powder, and I like it.
What a difference in softness!
Reusable Makeup Remover Cloth Towels Set - Remove mascara, exfoliate skin, clean your face - Eraser for you makeup! Wipe your face free only with warm water - MAKEUP BLUR (Leopard Print 9-Pack)
MAKEUP BLUR
{'Brand': 'MAKEUP BLUR', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 3.7 x 1.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '081227858148'}
These amazingly do the job of wiping makeup off my face without any products but warm water! It's gentle on my skin too. They are so soft, thick, and I want a blanket made of this material! I just want to hug it because it feels so nice.
Soft and Efficient!
Empty Plastic Mini Fine Mist Spray Bottles Refillable Pump Bottle 3.4oz / 100ml Small Travel Size with Labels Funnels Cleaner
DURSI
{'Brand': 'DURSI', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.73 x 1.73 x 5.31 inches'}
These are FOUR (4) ounce containers! These are a little bigger than we expected. They will take up more room in a carry-on quart sized bag than I want. However, the bottles and everything that came with them work well as expected. I just wish that the seller would verify information before advertising. I took off only one star for the advertisement disappointment, but I kept the other four stars because the set works well for the size that they are.
They are a little bigger than advertised. I measured 4 ounces!
6 Pack Spray Bottles,Empty Plastic Clear Small Transparent Travel Bottles Pump Bottle Lotion Dispenser Bottle Set,Refillable Liquid Containers 3oz and 2 oz
Cehomi
{'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.14 x 1.1 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
These can go on an airplane or be carried anywhere because they don't leak. I like that they included pumps aw well as spray bottle tops. Each one is interchangeable when you get them. My pump straws were too long, so I put them in the taller bottles, and put the spray tops on the smaller bottles. The pumps have a neck brace so it can't be pushed down by accident. There is a little funnel, and three lids for the sprayers. However, I did measure the size of the larger bottle with liquid and it holds more than the 100 ml that they advertised (3.30oz). They actually holds about 4 ounces, so keep that in mind if you are limited on space when traveling. The pumps and sprayers work well - they will be used on a future vacation.
Perfect Set!
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
These hair ties are exactly as advertised. You get 10 ties in 5 different colors. They have beads that resemble pearls attached to them. I wondered if they would look nice or if they would be too twisted to see the pearly beads on the outside. The result is that they look absolutely perfect!! You don't even have to do anything special to make them look nice. Just put it on as you normally would and the beads show well along with a nicely colored scrunchy hair tie! Good value!
Looks really nice!
Gentlehomme Face Moisturizer For Men - Mens Facial Lotion with Neroli Essential Oil Scent - Collagen & Stem Cells - Daily Anti-Aging Moisturizer for Dry & Oily Skin - 4 oz
Gentlehomme
{'Brand': 'Gentlehomme', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 2.83 x 2.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001419924'}
This moisturizer leaves my boyfriend's skin so soft feeling. The scent is light and very likable! When the container arrives, it is in a box that looks really nice. After you unscrew the cap of the container, there is a plastic moisture cap that lays on top. That is good to keep on the container because it keeps keep moisture inside. It has a little finger handle on the top so it is easy to remove. It's a great product but it costs a bit too much as there are other products that can do the same for a lot less.
Leaves skin SO Soft, BUT Propylene Glycol is the 2nd ingredient (water is 1st)!
20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
tiggell
{'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
These work as advertised. Big enough to fit my large fingertips without hurting them. They are a hard clear plastic with a metal rod and a metal spring. Make sure when you get yours to check the back end to see if the springs are aligned in the slots. If not, slide them with a fingernail or tool until they go into the slot. The batch that I received have metal springs that barely make it into the slot, which makes the spring pop-out if I open the clips all the way. If the springs were long enough, these would get a 5 star rating from me. As they are, I cannot recommend them. However, I do like that they come individually wrapped so they could be gifted in sets of 5 or 10 and the receiver would know the clips are unused.
Versatile, but watch out for short springs that come loose!
DAN Technology Anti-Scald 200℉-500℉ Electric Press Hot Comb for Black Hair, Beard and Wigs, Ceramic Unisex Hair Beard Straightener and Curler, Dual Voltage for Travel, Home and Salon Use
DAN Technology
{'Brand': 'DAN Technology', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Item Weight': '0.6 Pounds', 'Package Dimensions': '12.9 x 4.8 x 2.4 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DAN Technology'}
The anti scold comb protector is the best addition to this type of hair straightener. It keeps your head and ears from getting burned, while it lets your hair glide through the hot slits of the comb. The hot comb can be used for people with any colored hair. I know because I tried it on my slightly wavy thin light colored hair, and to my amazement, it worked! It has a digital display and a 360 degree cord (it can spin in circles without tangling). The temperature control knob is right where I place my hand, so I have to make sure that I don't hit it by accident. Other than that, it performs well, as advertised.
The hot comb can be used for people with any color of hair, not just "Black Hair, Beard and Wigs"
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Sensitivity:** The user has sensitive skin and experiences eczema, favoring hypoallergenic and gentle skincare products suitable for their family.

- **Family-Centric Choices:** Their purchases reflect a focus on products safe for newborns and babies, highlighting a strong commitment to family needs in skincare.

- **Effectiveness Over Brand Preference:** They prioritize product effectiveness over brand loyalty, seeking noticeable results in skin softness. The user's recent purchase indicates an openness to exploring products beyond traditional markets, prioritizing functionality across diverse demographics.

- **Scent Consideration:** The user appreciates mild aromas and tends to prefer light, pleasant fragrances that enhance their sensory experience with products.

- **Practical Product Use:** They value practical, travel-friendly solutions in their skincare routine, favoring reusable and functional items. This includes grooming tools that combine practicality with aesthetic appeal.

- **Positive Reviews:** They generally provide ratings based on product performance, noting specific issues when applicable. Their recent experience reflects a focus on quality and functionality, ensuring tools are effective and user-friendly.

- **Value Conscious:** The user is attentive to pricing and value while appreciating ingredient transparency and gifting potential.

- **Versatility in Use:** Recent interactions suggest a growing interest in versatile styling tools applicable to various hair types, reinforcing their preference for all-inclusive product effectiveness.

Overall, the user prioritizes gentle, effective, family-friendly skincare tailored to sensitive skin while valuing practicality, sensory experience, and accurate marketing in their purchasing decisions.
